_source.text: 60% Acer Iconia Tab A501 (AT&T) Source: PC Mag The bottom line with the A501 is no different than the A500: It's a good, solid tablet, with better-than-average support for media consumption, but there's nothing spectacular about it-including its "4G" speeds.
